eligibility_check.eligibility_check:
Let's check your eligibility:
1. Do you have at least 2 Directors? (Yes/No)
2. Do you have at least 2 Shareholders (can be the same as directors)? (Yes/No)
3. Is at least one Director an Indian Resident? (Yes/No)
4. Have you checked the availability of a unique company name? (Yes/No)
5. Do you have a registered office address in India? (Yes/No)

document_upload.document_upload:
Upload the following mandatory documents:
1. PAN Card for each Director & Shareholder
2. Aadhaar Card for each Director & Shareholder
3. Passport (if applicable)
4. Address Proof (Bank Statement / Utility Bill)
5. Electricity Bill / Rent Agreement for Registered Office
6. NOC from Office Owner (if rented)
Please upload one document at a time.
